Desc.entry: An independent provider of specialist supported accommodation for able-bodied and disabled young people aged over 16 years. The project is managed by qualified experienced social workers. Supports young people to develop independent living skills. The supported accommodation is in a new build property thoughtfully designed throughout to cater for both able-bodied and disabled young people. Accommodation is fully furnished to a high standard.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sun, please telephone to arrange an appointment
